name: Ctrl+S Humanity
description:
2D management game where the player has to save the world’s population and upload it to a rocket in order to preserve the existence of humanity. 
Decisions have to be made about what to save, as the world is crumbling around you.

Made by Group 3
Herman Pettersson - herman.pettersson@futuregames.nu
Tom Fjällström - tom.fjallstrom@gmail.com
Daniel Dahlquist - daniel.elmer.dahlquist@gmail.com
Jesper Taavola - jespertaavola@gmail.com
